comments:

Just assigning to specific component based on abstract.

Mike,  This wizard has gone away since M3 replaced by the new Web Module wizard,
for flexible projects....
Changed Version field given new release numbering.

Marking as verified to confirm this issue correctly categorized.
If, as originator, you disagree please re-open, or open a new bug. 

Thanks very much for reporting and helping make WTP better.
